attributes.action: Remove pitbulls and all bully breeds  off dangerous dog act
attributes.additional_details: I have been reasearching about pitbulls and have found out they have been banned for the wrong reasons .pitbulls use to be known as the nanny dog for the loyal loving caring nature towards children and humans .any dog sny breed can be aggressive if they are bought up like that .all dogs are like children they look up to us to teach them and learn them and in return they are loyal and listen to us unfourtently bad dog owners have learnt that the most loyal breed are pitbulls and used it against them to get them to do bad things just like a young child they do nt know there doing it but just doing what they have been taught and they get killed wud you kill a kid that has done summat bad because there parents told them too no you would punish there parents . Please take this into count and remove them off the act .p.s i use to think the same untill i spoke to charitys in america gt to know and reasearch them .
